message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed day with defensive consumption and healthcare firm (DABUR, MARICO, COLPAL, MAXHEALTH, FORTIS), PSU power/infra mixed (NHPC soft, SJVN green, RVNL flat), private banks stabilizing (AUBANK, INDUSINDBK), IT weak (MPHASIS, PERSISTENT). Select momentum in BEL, DELHIVERY, KPIGREEN, LAURUSLABS; profit-taking in POLYCAB and WAAREEENER.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Closed strong near resistance; above 420 zone could extend with high volume support today", "price": 421.0},
    {"symbol": "DELHIVERY", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Strong close near day’s high; continuation above today’s high sets fresh swing up", "price": 467.0},
    {"symbol": "KPIGREEN", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Range breakout setup with rising volume; trigger above today’s high", "price": 482.0},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Momentum day; strength continuation if price clears round-number resistance", "price": 902.1},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Tight consolidation between 329–335; entry on range expansion above day high", "price": 336.0},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Higher-low structure; push through recent high can resume uptrend", "price": 113.1},
    {"symbol": "IRCON", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Constructive base; trigger above today’s high to avoid chop", "price": 173.2},
    {"symbol": "AUBANK", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Banks stabilizing; reclaim of 800s opens room to prior swing highs", "price": 802.6},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Hold; add on strength", "reason": "Pullback held 91 zone; add only on reclaim of resistance to avoid averaging down", "price": 93.4},
    {"symbol": "RBLBANK", "signal": "Hold/Trail; add on strength", "reason": "Uptrend intact; add only through recent high to stay with momentum", "price": 305.6}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 18233.5,
    "total_value": 25548.5,
    "holdings_count": 3,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ 2385.00 (CMP 2485.60)",
      "RBLBANK: 10 units @ 291.60 (CMP 299.50)",
      "IDBI: 20 units @ 93.46 (CMP 91.72)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Hospitals firm: MAXHEALTH, FORTIS show steady demand; consider pullback buys into strength next week.",
    "Consumption resilient: DABUR, MARICO, COLPAL closed green; low-beta anchors if broader market wobbles.",
    "IT weak: MPHASIS, PERSISTENT faded; avoid fresh longs until they reclaim today’s opens.",
    "Cap goods cables: POLYCAB saw heavy dip; consider only on reclaim > 7510 to confirm strength. KEI mild softness.",
    "Solar/renewables: WAAREEENER sold off hard; wait for stabilization; KPIGREEN shows relative strength—prefer KPIGREEN on breakout.",
    "Telecom infra: BHARTIHEXA strong momentum; watch for continuation above 1826 with tight risk.",
    "Rail PSUs: RVNL, IRCON poised—prefer breakout entries to avoid range noise. SJVN watch above 91.3.",
    "Logistics: DELHIVERY closing near highs; potential follow-through early next week.",
    "Engineering/defence: HAL range-bound; GRSE cooled after spike—wait for fresh setups.",
    "Financials: AUBANK constructive; SBICARD muted; CREDITACC weak—avoid for now.",
    "CDSL steady; BSE holding gains—maintain BSE with a trailing stop near 2445.",
    "Banks PSU mixed: UNIONBANK, INDIANB soft intraday—no fresh PSU bank buys until strength returns.",
    "For our holdings: RBLBANK trail stop around 294; IDBI risk guard around 89.8; BSE trail near 2445.",
    "Position sizing plan for Monday: pick 2–3 best breakouts (e.g., BEL/DELHIVERY/KPIGREEN), ~₹3–4k each, use buy-stop triggers with 2–3% stops.",
    "Avoid chasing extended candles at open; prefer confirmation above trigger plus sustained volume."
  ]
}
